name: Beans, Ghosts & Magic
description:
Fight the unholy ghosts in a pretty, colorful environment! Use your magic powers to summon friendly soldiers. Take command of your forces and expand them using the upgrade system to tackle the ever-growing threat of new enemy types. 

Controls:

 - WSAD to move around

 - Number keys to summon friendly soldiers, ex. 1, 2...

 - Left mouse click to tell the soldiers where to go, or press space to call them to yourself
